channel.title: Vaccines and Autism on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Vaccines and Autism on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Vaccines and Autism
item.description:
Today, the rate at which people are being diagnosed with autism has been increasing. This has caused concern for many who believe that vaccines could potentially be causing autism. Keep on reading to learn about the different hypothesis on between vaccines and autism, and whether or not vaccines can cause autism.

The history of vaccines and autism
